properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICK, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDR, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND SECESSION_FL ='N'
INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?,?, NULL, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NICK = ?, MEMBER_TEL = ?, MEMBER_ADDR = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO =? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET SECESSION_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_PW =? AND MEMBER_NO =?
SELECT count(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT count(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICK = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
